import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Col, Row, Button, Form, Card, FormGroup, Jumbotron, Container, Label, Input, FormText, InputGroup, CardHeader, CardBody, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText } from "reactstrap"; import { motion } from "framer-motion" import InputRange from "react-input-range"; import { Link, NavLink, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; class CreateOption extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); this.state = {userFriendly: new Boolean()}; } handleSubmit = (e) => { this.props.history.push("/admin/searchplayer"); /*this.setState({ error: err.response.data.Message, });*/ //this.togglewarningModal(); }; render() { const spring = { type: "spring", stiffness: 700, damping: 30 }; if (this.state.userFriendly == true) { return (
this.setState({userFriendly:false})} style ={{float:"right"}}>
sm=8 sm=4 sm=4 sm=true sm=true sm=true
); } else { return (
this.setState({userFriendly:true})} style ={{float:"right"}}>
); } } } export default CreateOption;
